articles.title: Physical modeling for pure data (PMPD) and real-time interaction with an audio synthesis

title: pmpd3d
description: The `pmpd3d` object implements 3D physical models based on a mass-spring-damper system. It allows users to define and manipulate masses and links, applying forces and setting parameters to simulate physical interactions. The object outputs model parameters and can be integrated with GEM for visual rendering of the 3D simulation.
